control

Description

Dinamic form control generator through templates with extended validation

Usage

as attribute
<ANY control
     model="{string}"="{string}"
     form="{string}"
     title="{string}"
     placeholder="{string}"
     source="{string}"
     key="{string}"
     label="{string}"
     required>
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
modelstring

the target model of control

controlstring

the type of control, available types (text, password, email, number, checkbox, textarea, datetime-local, select, autocomplete)

(default: text)

formstring

the name of the form

(default: Form)

titlestring

the title of the control

(default: Untitled)

placeholderstring

the placeholder of the control

(default: title)

sourcestring

datasource of select as array

(default: null)

keystring

optional key for select option

(default: id)

labelstring

optional label for select option

(default: name)

requiredstring

if the control is required

(default: false)

Example

Source
